text:
Any attempts to use <del type="dir" 
Will NOT remove the directories.
However the files will be deleted.
Is there a workaround to implement the <del type="dir"
command to Remove (sub)Directories as well as deleting the files?
creator: mgainty@hotmail.com

text:
Works for me. Try the following:

<project name="14757" default="test">
  <target name="test">
    <mkdir dir="testdir"/>
    <touch file="testdir/testfile.txt"/>
    <delete dir="testdir"/>
  </target>
</project>
creator: conor@apache.org
